headline: Multi-million-dollar manufacturing expansions planned in Decatur
summary: Nov. 20—Two Decatur companies will pursue a combined $37.6 million in expansions, with one bringing at least 40 new jobs to the area. M&J Industries Inc. and the J.M. Smucker Co. shared plans for expansion with the Decatur Industrial Development Board on Tuesday, during which time the two companies presented four separate requests for tax abatements. All requests were approved. M&J Industries ...
